[00:02.44]What they say

[00:07.07]Tay Keith f**k these n***as up

[00:50.23]You should know

[00:59.25]Before I let go

[01:36.60]Before I let go

[02:04.50]Before I let you go woah
[02:16.76]I would never never never never never never never never
[02:22.19]Let you go before I go
[02:41.89]I pull up to Coachella Pull up

[03:02.47]Ooh To the left
[03:04.17]I just wanna have a good time Turn around

[03:20.55]Ooh drop it down drop it down low low

[03:29.75]Step on 'em step on 'em step on 'em step

[03:42.66]Before I let before I let b-b-before I let go

[00:00.00]//

[00:26.84]你让我很幸福
[00:31.43]你可以打赌的
[00:35.96]和我在一起 你很幸福
[00:40.56]我会永远记住
[00:45.43]我真的很爱你
[00:50.14]你应该清楚
[00:54.53]我想确定一下 我就是那个对的人
[00:59.28]在我放手之前
[01:03.79]此刻 我们拥有美好的时光
[01:08.87]我们可以说
[01:13.35]彼此互相伤害

[02:04.31]在我放开你的手之前
[02:16.68]我永远不会

[02:54.26]很多酒
[02:55.30]我干了很多蠢事
[02:56.80]我干了很多蠢事
[02:57.80]跟着《Dirty Diana》这首歌

[03:03.46]跳到左边
[03:04.18]我想快乐一些
[03:06.01]旋转

[03:25.07]贴近地面
